verses.text: \w A|strong="G2532"\w* \w few|strong="G1722"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* later \w Jesus|strong="G1525"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w back|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G1510"\w* heard \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w home|strong="G3624"\w*,

immediately \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w such|strong="G5620"\w* \w large|strong="G4183"\w* \w numbers|strong="G4183"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w no|strong="G3371"\w* \w more|strong="G4183"\w* \w room|strong="G5562"\w*, \w not|strong="G3366"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* outside \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w door|strong="G2374"\w*, \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w paralytic|strong="G3885"\w* \w was|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Him|strong="G2532"\w*, \w carried|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w men|strong="G5064"\w*.

\w Since|strong="G1223"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w unable|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w get|strong="G4374"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1510"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crowd|strong="G3793"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* uncovered \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w roof|strong="G4721"\w* \w above|strong="G3699"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, made \w an|strong="G2532"\w* opening, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* lowered \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w paralytic|strong="G3885"\w* \w on|strong="G3588"\w* \w his|strong="G1223"\w* \w mat|strong="G2895"\w*.

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w paralytic|strong="G3885"\w*, “\w Son|strong="G5043"\w*, \w your|strong="G2532"\w* sins \w are|strong="G3588"\w* forgiven \w you|strong="G4771"\w*.”

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thinking \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*,

“\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w does|strong="G5101"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w such|strong="G3779"\w* blasphemies? \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* forgive sins \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w alone|strong="G1520"\w*?”

\w At|strong="G1722"\w* once \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w His|strong="G1438"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* thinking \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w way|strong="G3779"\w* \w within|strong="G1722"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*. “\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* thinking \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*?” \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*.

“\w Which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w easier|strong="G2123"\w*: \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w paralytic|strong="G3885"\w*, ‘\w Your|strong="G2532"\w* sins \w are|strong="G1510"\w* forgiven,’ \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w Get|strong="G1453"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*, pick \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w mat|strong="G2895"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*’?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Man|strong="G5207"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* forgive sins...” \w He|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w paralytic|strong="G3885"\w*,

“\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w get|strong="G1453"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*, pick \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w mat|strong="G2895"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w* \w home|strong="G3624"\w*.”

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3956"\w* \w got|strong="G1453"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*, picked \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w his|strong="G3956"\w* \w mat|strong="G2895"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* walked \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w front|strong="G1715"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w As|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w result|strong="G5620"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w astounded|strong="G1839"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w We|strong="G3754"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w anything|strong="G3956"\w* \w like|strong="G3779"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w*!”

\w Once|strong="G3825"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1831"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w beside|strong="G3844"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*. \w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w As|strong="G2532"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* walking \w along|strong="G2532"\w*, \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w Levi|strong="G3018"\w* son \w of|strong="G2532"\w* Alphaeus \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w tax|strong="G5058"\w* \w booth|strong="G5058"\w*. “Follow \w Me|strong="G1473"\w*,” \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Levi|strong="G3018"\w* got \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* followed \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w While|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w dining|strong="G4873"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* Levi’s \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w tax|strong="G5057"\w* \w collectors|strong="G5057"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sinners \w were|strong="G1510"\w* eating \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w His|strong="G1722"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*—\w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w followed|strong="G1096"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w eating|strong="G2068"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w these|strong="G3326"\w* \w people|strong="G2068"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* \w His|strong="G3708"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, “\w Why|strong="G3754"\w* \w does|strong="G2068"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w tax|strong="G5057"\w* \w collectors|strong="G5057"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sinners?”

\w On|strong="G3004"\w* hearing \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w It|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w healthy|strong="G2480"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* doctor, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sick|strong="G2560"\w*. \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w call|strong="G2564"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* sinners, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* repentance.”

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* often \w fasting|strong="G3522"\w*. \w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G1510"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* don’\w t|strong="G3588"\w* \w Your|strong="G4674"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w fast|strong="G3522"\w* like \w John|strong="G2491"\w*’s \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*?”

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w How|strong="G3745"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* guests \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w bridegroom|strong="G3566"\w* \w fast|strong="G3522"\w* \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*? \w As|strong="G3745"\w* \w long|strong="G5550"\w* \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w cannot|strong="G1410"\w* \w fast|strong="G3522"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w time|strong="G2250"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w bridegroom|strong="G3566"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* taken \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*; \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w fast|strong="G3522"\w*.

\w No|strong="G3762"\w* \w one|strong="G3762"\w* \w sews|strong="G1976"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w patch|strong="G1915"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* unshrunk \w cloth|strong="G4470"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w old|strong="G3820"\w* \w garment|strong="G2440"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w does|strong="G1096"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w piece|strong="G1915"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* pull away \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w old|strong="G3820"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w worse|strong="G5501"\w* \w tear|strong="G4978"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* result.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w one|strong="G3762"\w* pours \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w old|strong="G3820"\w* wineskins. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* does, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w burst|strong="G4486"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* skins, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* spill \w out|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* wineskins \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* ruined. \w Instead|strong="G1161"\w*, \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w poured|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* wineskins.”

\w One|strong="G3588"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w passing|strong="G3899"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w grainfields|strong="G4702"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w His|strong="G1223"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w began|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w pick|strong="G5089"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w heads|strong="G4719"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w grain|strong="G4719"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* walked \w along|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Look|strong="G3708"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* unlawful \w on|strong="G4160"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*?”

\w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Have|strong="G2192"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* read \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G4160"\w* \w companions|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w hungry|strong="G3983"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w*?

\w During|strong="G3624"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G2532"\w* priesthood \w of|strong="G2316"\w* Abiathar, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ate|strong="G2068"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w consecrated|strong="G4286"\w* bread, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* \w only|strong="G1487"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w priests|strong="G2409"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w some|strong="G3739"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w companions|strong="G3588"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* declared, “\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w man|strong="G3756"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w man|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G5620"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Man|strong="G5207"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*.”
